title: Really? People ban that champ you want to play??
body:
Well had my first game of ranked in a while and first lobby i get into the adc says they dont like the support im playing, I simply ignore them adn they proceed to dodge. I then am put into the same lobby with the same adc except this time the banned the support champ i wanted to play last time on purpose. Obveousily I dodge for my first time becuase clearly that player was and asshole and playing a match with them clearly wasnt going to go well.

Is there anything we can do about these players

replies.body: Can confirm, Singed support in low ELO is amazing
How did you re-queue with the same guy straight after the game broke? He would have had to sit through a 5 minute timer.
The reason for this is because the banner is scared of that champ (obviously), or the even more obvious, the champion is toooooooo strong because of patch buffs.
They banned it becuase they had a cry that first lobby about not liking that champ.......
Who was the champion? Are they even considered OP or anything like that?

Haha, I could understand why some ADCs would not like that champion to be played as a "support". I checked out your match history and it doesn't look like you were supporting, rather just using the lane as a buffer to play Singed. Of course, anything can work in bronze, but try him in the top lane. You'll scale up much faster because you'll get farm. And not annoy players that are trying to play the current meta of ADC + Support in the bot lane.
I'd ban him too if you did that. You are clearly trolling.

your name is BlitzForever but you play Singed support?

I guess {{champion:27}} is the new {{champion:53}}

Dodging because someone banned your champ is no better than banning the champ someone else wants to play because you don't like it.

Don't be *that* guy.
If someone on my team intends to pick yasuo. HELL BLOODY YES I WILL BAN YAS. They all suck with him so bad why risk it.
no its called "the right choice" without fail if you don't, it does happen.
Riot didn't allow you to reveal what champion you would want to play just so someone on your team can ban it away.

Only ever with yasuo.

Put it this way as well, loads of people always want to play yas because of his synergy with the strong knockup cc things like malph, so that person in last pick who wants yas, he has ~17% chance to get him (that's without any allies trolling to pick him), the chance is low of them getting it anyway, and more often than not they counter pick themselves and feed hard, or just feed hard in general because they cant have the skill, its just not worth losing lp in the 0.5% chance he doesn't suck super hard. It's for the good of the team, the only time its worthwhile is if they are higher up on the pick chain, and if they have really good past yasuo score, they are better off going a safe picker over an all in no reward pick. Yasuo is easy to stuff up on and die, hard to fight with unless ahead or with good mechanics, and much much more, 99% of the time they feed and lose, just not worth losing lp because he wanted to play a champ he would otherwise feed with.
